title: S*it rentals with Melvin
material_description: digital screen recording of @PurplePinger's TikTok stream
brief_description: With his ironic analysis of rental property listings, @PurplesPingers has become a symbol of Australia’s frustration with the housing crisis. Using just a smartphone and a deadpan delivery, the activist and lawyer dissects the misleading and exaggerated claims of property listings, exposing the shoddy practices of real estate agencies and the dodgy conditions renters face. His videos have received over 4.3m likes on TikTok, leading him to be comment on the crises on news and morning shows. Though conservative hosts can be combative, the activist maintains his ironic detachment, employing logic and the law to dismantle their arguments.
